title: Can a water pump be used for a garden hose? I use a trash water pump to run my sprinkler off-grid.

tasks.task: Hooking up a two-inch trash pump to a sprinkler system using a hose adapter
subtasks: Obtaining necessary parts for the adapter
Connecting the two-inch hose to the adapter
Attaching the garden hose to the adapter
Testing the water flow and connection for leaks
Ensuring the pump functions correctly with the adapter in place
Evaluating the ability to irrigate using the connected system
